name: roguelike_mini
description:
a little roguelike i made over the weekend. it's most likely filled with bugs, and funky collisions, and broken sounds, and glitchy maps, and so on and so forth.

arrow keys - movement.

space - sword.

enter - fireball.

made in gamemaker studio 2.

graphics in aseprite.

music in bosca ceoil.

sfx in bfxr.

font m3x6 by @managore.
